result.arabic_text: إِنَّ فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ لَأٓيَٰتٖ لِّلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ
result.translation: Mu vy’ukuri mu majuru indwi, no mw’isi izosokorokamwo ibiremwa, ari na yo irimwo ibiremwa bitandukanye mu bwoko no mu ndemo, ni ukuri muri ivyo vyose harimwo ivyemezo vyerekana ubushobozi n'ububasha vy’Imana Allah, ku bavyemera;
